title: Annoyed at Players Elo Boosting Mates and people in Ranked
body: Played 5 games in ranked thought it would be good and a great way to play with other people but there had to be one person who thought it be fun to play with a higher elo player and ruin the game for my team, i understand that its suppose to be fun..... But it annoys me that there are people out there like a  "Zekzo235" who spams low level ranked games. Ive played LOL since beta and this thing is starting to get under my skin time to stop playing and tell my mates the same then.. IF nothing will be done about it...

replies.body: A change was made to prevent this. Now only people from one league above or below your current one can queue with you, roughly aligning with the lax of standard solo queue match-making.

Bronze 5 0LP rofl
your wont get demoted anyway{{champion:115}}
